title: Apple shows off mixed reality headset behind closed doors
content:
There have been numerous rumored Apple devices over the years but perhaps the top two most intriguing would be Apple’s ‘Project Titan’ and its mixed reality headset. It looks like one of the two are closer to becoming a final product, as it was reportedly previewed for Apple executives at a recent meeting. According to

The post Apple shows off mixed reality headset behind closed doors appeared first on XDA.
description: It is being reported that Apple has shown off its long rumored mixed reality headset to executives and board members behind closed doors.
